name: Mazelight
description:
Mazelight (formerly Candlelight) is a retro-style atmospheric horror adventure game made by a team of three people for the TairaGames Game Jam of July 2017.

Switch between the Lantern and the Shiv using 1 and 2 on the keyboard, press Escape to pause.

There are two levels in the maze, each with a map that will show the exit (if the exit is on that level).

KNOWN BUGS:

The shiv does not function.

Candles may spawn halfway through the floor.

Made by:

MrKagouris

StinkyDubeau

Gabe
